headline: What Rally? These Stocks Are Still Historically Cheap.
summary: “The bad news is the stock market has been incredibly concentrated during the current bull market,” wrote longtime market analyst Jim Paulsen in a note Monday.  Fewer than one in four stocks in the MSCI World Index are within 5% of their record price, wrote Ned Davis Research strategist Tim Hayes on Thursday.
